EmailTemplate.subject: MBO Partners Follow up (1357251746.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Dear Snezhk , Some time ago you requested information regarding the services offered by MBO Partners. Now might not be the right time for you. You may find some of the resources we develop specifically designed for independent consultants helpful for you: - The Independence Guide <http://www.mbopartners.com/independents-guide?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCekNesEli4vKYArn5kjDEc5msvq90Dvn1nMwx1CIUGIalUg%3D%3D> - Recorded Independent Consulting Webinar Index <http://www.mbopartners.com/mbo-partners-webcast-index> - Reports on Independent Consulting in America <http://www.mbopartners.com/state-of-independence/> - Independent Consulting Brief Monthly <http://www.mbopartners.com/independent-consulting-brief> Any update would be great, you may simply reply to this email. Best regards,Sara___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files.
